query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rag_documents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `source` varchar(512) NOT NULL,
  `sourceType` enum('file','url','text','code','documentation') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'file',
  `mimeType` varchar(100),
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `contentHash` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','processing','indexed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `chunkCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `tags` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `indexedAt` timestamp,
  CONSTRAINT `rag_documents_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_user_id_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_content_hash_idx` (`contentHash`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user D8P1hPzTB2gvSDs.1e2fcfb2221e --database 32FJ7HPReivSdgawqQ3aa4 --execute 
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rag_documents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `source` varchar(512) NOT NULL,
  `sourceType` enum('file','url','text','code','documentation') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'file',
  `mimeType` varchar(100),
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `contentHash` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','processing','indexed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `chunkCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `tags` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `indexedAt` timestamp,
  CONSTRAINT `rag_documents_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_user_id_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `rag_documents_content_hash_idx` (`contentHash`)
);
